properties.address: Church Road, Wrockwardine Wood, , Telford TF2 7AH
properties.description: We are a church in Telford who are open daily (Monday- Friday) between 9.30 and 12.00. We run a FoodShare (surplus stock which has reached it best before) and a FoodBank (tinned and dried foods) We are fortunate that we have a warm building and are happy to open for people to drop in for hot drinks, a chance to get warm, breakfast (cereal by request or toast). We also have a clothing bank with clothes available from kids to adults. There is always a volunteer available to chat and reading books or mindfulness colouring books (and pens) on hand.
properties.title: Holy Trinity Church Wrockwardine Wood

properties.address: Donnington Community Hub, St Matthews Road, Telford, Shropshire tf3 7pr
properties.description: a warm space to socialise and get hot drinks and snacks
properties.title: Meet & Eat

properties.description: The warm space is open to all ages and provides a free soup lunch, tea or coffee and a cake.
properties.title: St John's Soup Lunches at the WCC

properties.description: Stone library has two floors. There is a sofa area downstairs and a table upstairs and down. There is a public toilet with a baby change facility. A reading nook for children. Tables and chairs for little ones to colour in. Coffee and tea will be served Monday-Friday 10.00am-12.00pm & 2.00pm-4.00pm (apart from Wednesdays when we close at 1pm) Contact: 01785 895585 or visit our Instagram page @staffordstonelibraries
properties.title: Stone Library

properties.address: Rising Brook- Church at the Crossing, STONE, Stone ST15 8ER
properties.description: All welcome to drop in to our warm, welcoming space. Hot or cold drinks are provided, option to donate if you can. Join in with chat, games or craft, sit quietly if you prefer.
properties.title: The Crossing Welcome Space

properties.address: Walton Community Centre,, STONE, Stone ST15 0EQ
properties.description: With focus is the elderly, but all ages are welcome. It is an opportunity to meet and have a chat whilst enjoying a hot soup. We offer soup, a roll and a hot drink and cake. It is free to all and all are welcome.
properties.title: Warm Spaces Soup Lunches at the WCC

properties.description: Warm welcome space to just be or chat. Hot drinks and food available for free.
properties.title: Welcome Cafe
